- Optimized user experience.

- Equipment System(Blacksmith) released!
- Added more bind function, now you can bind your account to Facebook.
- Various UI optimization.

- Fog of War: The Fog begin to disperse in the new version. And you can see your enemies' locations through the semi-fog, but guessing still comes into play at times owing to uncertainty about enemies' capability, which creates more strategic gameplay: Bluffing, Making Allies or Hiding strength. Only the lord with the deepest strategy will win out.
- Exploring Rewards: You will have changes to get Random Items while exploring the Fog on Kingdom map.
- Modification of Event Center Rewards Description.
- Emoji Added: Allows you to see and input cool emojis on Chat and Message.
- Overall Graphics Quality Improved.

- Multi-languages & Chat translation system is available in this version.
- More account options are available: now you can unbind account or start a new account on your device.
- Improved Bookmark system, which allows you to manage your bookmarks more effectively.
- Misc. user experience and balancing improvements.

Thanks for all of your supports! Rage on!

Thanks for all of your supports! Rage on!

- Solo Quest & VIP Quest added.
- Second Building Queue is available now. Level up your buildings faster, enjoy!
- Message Edit Mode: You are able to delete/mark-as-read multiple items at one time.
- Secret Gift: You will receive Secret Gifts from time to time by mails in game. So, my Lord, please remember to check your mails frequently.
- Misc. experience improvements and balance tweaks.
